thread.title: Top 5 Maine Things To See

author: admin
title: Top 5 Maine Things To See
text:
Home > Travel Destinations > Top 5 Maine Things To See Top 5 Maine Things To See By admin on August 13, 2015 Pin It 
There are a number of fun attractions in Maine and this is the reason why Maine has been given the nickname “Vacationland”. Maine is the best place for you irrespective of the fact that whether you are fond of big adventure or love beautiful sightseeing. 
The Top Maine things to see include many scenic natural beauties. When in Maine, you can enjoy skiing, golfing, biking, visiting lighthouses, boating, visiting galleries and museums and shopping at the antique shops. 
There are beautiful mountains and coasts in Maine and it is one of the best places for people who are close to Mother Nature. The beaches of Maine are the best attractions of this place but there are other things that can also be enjoyed like the historical sites and the farms. Top Maine Things To See 
The top Maine things to see that you should now miss during your visit include: Bar Harbor 
This is a vacation spot which is crowded by visitors throughout the year. This place has innumerable shops and stores, excellent restaurants and most important some of the most beautiful beaches. Locals here are quite friendly and open making a visit to this place relaxing and fun. Acadia National Park 
Acadia National park serves as a home to a beautiful and rugged stretch of streams, inland lakes, forests and coastline. The place offers a playground for the visitors as well as the locals who are fond of the outdoors. You will also find hiking trails and two campgrounds at this park. Portland Head Lighthouse 
Portland Head Lighthouse is one of the famous lighthouses in USA , which is located in Cape Elizabeth, Maine. This historic lighthouse is the oldest lighthouses located in Maine. The house of former lighthouse keeper is converted to maritime museum. Kennebunkport 
Kennebunkport is a tiny coast set at a distance of 12.5 miles towards South Portland. This is one of the best Maine things to see and is especially popular during the summer season. 
The Town House School possessing collections of local history and Seashore Trolley Museum are the best places to visit at Kennebunkport. Bowdoin College Museum of Art 
This museum is located within college campus at Brunswick and it features different collections of contemporary and ancient art. Gallery talks, rotating temporary displays, symposia, tours, lectures and publications take place all round the year.
